channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
That is my Code for webclient [code] <center><applet name="Client" width="765" height="503" archive="http://desolution.org/play/Desolution.jar" code="Client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx700m"> <param name="server_name" value="Desolution"> </applet></center> [/CODE]
Im getting an Webclient error, I dont really know how to fix. I exported the .Jar in Eclipse cause JarMaker didnt work for me.
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/35a2976.jpg[/img]
